title: Fully remodeled one bedroom (2nd floor ) for rent in Clarkston
app_fee: $75 upon selection only, to run credit and criminal check
posting_body: Fully remodeled one bedroom (2nd floor apartment ) for rent in desirable apartment building in the heart of the Village of Clarkston.
A few steps from Main St, Depot park and Deer Lake beach.
Live in the heart of it all with convenient access to I-75.
Take a look at this video to see the finishes of the apartment!
https://youtu.be/P4VmLdWLkm8
Rent: $975 per month+$92 utility fee that covers gas (heat), water, sewer and trash.
This utility fee is adjusted each year (March) to actual costs.
You are responsible for electric bill, cable and internet.
Total monthly obligation $1067.
Lease Term: 12-18 months
Bedrooms: 1
Baths: 1
Kitchen: Stove, refrigerator, dishwasher, microwave, disposal
Laundry: Full size washer and dryer in common laundry room (No Quarters Necessary)
Parking: space for 1 vehicle only
Key-less access to building and apartment
Available for occupancy September 1st, 2022.
Building features:
Quiet and friendly building
Hallways fresh paint, new lighting and new carpet.
Basement: fresh paint, epoxy floors, two sets of new washer and dryer free for tenant use only.
Requirements to qualify:
Application fee: $75 (non-refundable) only upon selection
Minimum income: $3500/month
Proof of income
Security deposit: $1500 based on credit and other qualifying criteria.
Due when contract is signed and contract will be presented upon selection of resident.
No pets
No smoking
First month of rent to be paid before occupancy
If you read this post entirely and watched the videos, and you want more information or are interested on an application, contact Rich at 248 v 302 v 4444
